text: Came very close to losing my son as well. My heart breaks for you. People need to be educated about Suboxin. It's saving lives. I'm so sorry about your son there but for the grace of God go I.

text: LOL ...meanwhile in Canada, our Prime Minister has a terrorist rehab program, legal clinics dishing out methadone and suboxin to the masses, while drunk drivers kill innocent lives and get a slap on the wrist for it ... and yet cannabis is apparently worst than em all ..

text: Mark H, the guy is on Suboxin or whatever it is. He's getting help. He goes to meetings and is under a doctors care so why don't you back the fuck off. He's staying clean right now and should be supported for that.
